title: Magic video converter v8.0.3.18 with working serial (En,Fran,Ita
description:
Magic Video Converter meets all your needs for DVD CD/SVCD burning and video format converting. It can convert and split a wide range of formats such as AVI, MPEG, MPEG 1, MPEG 2, MPEG 4, VCD, DVD, SVCD, RMVB, RM, WMV, MOV, DIVX, etc. The latest version can recognize more formats! It is easy-to-use and only requires 4 steps to convert video files.
Having been integrated more user-friendly rationale in the interfaces, the converting processes are fast and interesting.


    * Convert AVI, MPEG, MPEG 1, MPEG 2, MPEG 4, VCD, DVD, SVCD, RMVB, RM, WMV, MOV, DIVX and other video formats.
    * Convert your movies in batch mode.
    * Split AVI, VCD, DVD or other videos into several ones.
    * Burn DVD and create menu.
    * Customize video screen size, audio/video bit rate, frame rate and aspect
    * Much, much more ...

The software is very user-friendly according to our 10, 000 users, as they selected ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œEase of useÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ as the No. 1 feature in a recent survey.
Video batch conversion

Well, 20 hours movie may take several hours to convert, and you don't have to be sitting and waiting. Just add all AVI files you want to convert, Magic Video Converter will convert these files automatically.

System Requirements

    * Processor type: Pentium
    * Processor speed: 233 MHz
    * Memory (Cache): 64 MB RAM Minimum
    * Hard disk: IDE
    * Operating system: Windows 98/2000/XP/2003/Vista
    * Soundcard: MME-compatible Soundcard
    * Graphics: 256 colors @ 800 x 600
